JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Full-time

Responsibilities:

1. Prepare and cook a variety of Asian cuisines (e.g., Chinese, Korean, Japanese);

2. Ensure quality and consistency in food preparation according to the restaurant menu;

3. Maintain kitchen hygiene and comply with food safety standards;

4. Collaborate with the team to develop new dishes and enhance the menu;

5. Manage food inventory and control costs effectively.

 

Requirements:

1. Experience in cooking Asian cuisines, with a focus on Korean dishes preferred;

2. Passion for cooking, attention to detail, and strong sense of responsibility;

3. Team player with the ability to work in a fast-paced environment;

4. 1-3 years of relevant experience; culinary certifications are a plus;

 

What We Offer:

1. Competitive salary package;

2. Professional training and opportunities for career growth;

3. Friendly and collaborative work environment;

4. Health benefits and staff meals.

 

How to Apply:

Please send your CV to hr@koreanskbbq.dk to schedule an interview.

 

Join us to create exceptional Asian culinary experiences together!

 

Koreansk BBQ
